alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Mobile Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 13 at 2:49PM CDT until April 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Mobile Central and Baldwin Central Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of the US 90 Mobile Bay Causeway will likely begin to see overwash over the next couple of hours. Minor overwash has begun as high tide is not expected for another couple of hours and winds have become more southerly than southwesterly allowing for water to pile into the northern part of Mobile Bay.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
